headline: FedEx, UPS, Oakley face lawsuits over Trump tariff refunds
summary: A suit against FedEx for a refund of $36 in duties plus fees could expand to millions of plaintiffs if a judge certifies it as a class action in the wake of a Supreme Court decision deeming certain Trump tariffs unlawful. The post FedEx, UPS, Oakley face lawsuits over Trump tariff refunds appeared first on FreightWaves.
